alert.note: Alert for Central Chaffee County Below 9000 Ft; Eastern Sawatch Mountains above 11000 Ft; Leadville Vicinity, Lake County Below 11000 Ft; Western Chaffee County Between 9000 and 11000 Ft; Western Mosquito Range, East Chaffee County above 9000Ft; Western Mosquito Range, East Lake County Above 11000 Ft (Colorado) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued May 20 at 4:18AM MDT until May 21 at 6:00AM MDT by NWS Pueblo
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM NOON TODAY TO 6 AM MDT SATURDAY... * WHAT...Snow expected. Total snow accumulations of 3 to 8 inches over the upper Arkansas River Valley floor and 6 to 12 inches over the higher terrain. * WHERE... All of Chaffee and Lake Counties, including the mountain ranges. * WHEN...From noon Friday to 6 AM MDT Saturday. * IMPACTS...Travel could be difficult. The hazardous conditions could impact the evening commute. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Rain and snow showers across the upper Arkansas River Valley this afternoon transitions to all snow this evening.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. The latest road conditions for the state you are calling from can be obtained by calling 5 1 1.
